title: Recruitment
description: Cornell Data Science is currently recruiting freshmen and transfer students across all subteams for Fall 2023! Please attend our information sessions on September 25th and 27th to learn more and get any specific questions answered. The deadline for upperclassmen has passed. The full timeline is shown below.

info.title: Info Sessions
info.body: Information sessions will be held at 7pm on Monday, September 25th, 2023 in RPCC auditorium, and 4:30pm on Wednesday, September 27th, 2023 in Gates G01. If you are unable to attend the info sessions, the slides will be posted here after the second info session.

info.title: Coffee Chats
info.body:
Feel free to reach out to any of the members listed here if you want to learn more about CDS, or fill out the coffee chat matching form here!

Coffee chats are optional and not required to apply.

info.title: Application
info.body:
All subteams are recruiting freshmen/transfers this semester (Fall 2023). First, complete the General Project Team Application through the College of Engineering. Then, fill out the specific application for freshmen/transfers.

Applications are due Thursday, September 28th for freshmen and transfer students. After the application review, selected candidates will be contacted to schedule interviews.

For more information on the project team application process, click here.

info.title: Interviews
info.body: We will reach out to select applicants to conduct interviews over the following weeks. These will be both technical and behavioral. More information and interview materials will be sent to selected applicants.
